explains: v. 刺绣；润色；渲染（embroider 的过去分词）

sentences.en: She embroidered flowers on the cushion covers.
sentences.cn: 她在这些靠垫套上绣了花。

sentences.en: She embroidered the cushion covers with flowers.
sentences.cn: 她在这些靠垫套上绣了花。

sentences.en: The towels were embroidered with their intertwined initials.
sentences.cn: 这些毛巾上绣着他们缠绕着的第一个字母。
